# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported |
|---------|-----------|
| 1.x     | ✅ Current stable |
| 0.2.x   | ⚠️ Security fixes only |
| < 0.2.0 | ❌        |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability, please report it responsibly:

1. **Do not** open a public issue
2. Email the maintainers or use [GitHub's private vulnerability reporting](https://github.com/mcp-tool-shop-org/ThrottleAI/security/advisories/new)
3. Include steps to reproduce and potential impact

We will acknowledge within 48 hours and aim to release a fix within 7 days for critical issues.
